name: castor (nathangateaureuze)
description:
Synopsis:

Jean-John, a young beaver, live peacefully with his tribe until a pack of wolverines settled in the shore. The wolverines, that need to be fed, want to weaken the beavers. Consequently, they broke the beavers’ dams in their river. Jean-John, being a very good constructor, will fix the destroyed dams before the flow of the river begins to be too dangerous for his family.

Controls:

←→: go to left or right

space barre: jump

s: fangs bite

c: fix a dam

←↓↑→: move in the water

Objects:

: stick (collectible)

: clay (collectible)

: branch (breakable)

: wolverine (enemy)
